## PointValues.getFieldType() method

Gets the type of field with given name, if it exists. If the field is not present, returns undefined.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getFieldType(name: string): PointFieldType | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | field name |

**Returns:**

[PointFieldType](./influxdb3-client.pointfieldtype.md) \| undefined

The field type or undefined.
